notes: Double clicking the item casts it on self.
A hero cannot consume more than one Royal Jelly.
Can only target heroes and Meepo clones.
Cannot target illusions, creep-heroes and other clones. Tempest Doubles copy the Royal Jelly buff, if the main hero has it. Illusions and Wukong’s Command clones do not copy the Royal Jelly buff.
abilities.description: Grants a target allied unit a permanent buff that provides +2.5 Health Regen and +1.25 Mana Regen.
